'''''Bonhams Books, Maps, Manuscripts and Historical Photographs 12 June 2012''''' is an auction catalogue from Bonhams (London). The description for Lot 150 includes extracts of a postcard from [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] to Miss Kilbride (cf. "[[Letter to Miss Kilbride]]"). The postcard is reproduced in a photograph.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.tolkienguide.com/modules/wordpress/archives/272|articlename=Tolkien Handwritten Postcard For Auction - Bonhams 12 June 2012|dated=29 May 2012|website=Guide|accessed=2 June 2012}}</ref>
